name: Vata Dosha
description: Controls movement, circulation, and nervous system activity

name: Pitta Dosha
description: Regulates metabolism, digestion, and body heat

name: Prana Vata
description: Governs respiration and subtle life energy

name: Udana Vata
description: Controls speech, growth, and upward movement in the body

name: Apana Vata
description: Manages excretion, reproductive system, and downward movements

name: Sadhaka Pitta
description: Influences intellect, memory, and emotional processing

name: Kledaka Kapha
description: Responsible for lubrication of digestive tract and moisture balance
